abstract.para: Note: This document lists changes only since the 1.79.1 release.

section.title: Release Notes: snapshot
section.para: The following is a list of changes that have been made since the 1.79.1 release.

section.title: Gentext
section.para: The following changes have been made to the gentext code since the 1.79.1 release.

screen.phrase: Change URLs in locale README from sourceforge to github
Corrected and updated nb and nn locales

para.literal: Robert Stayton: locale/cy.xml; locale/lv.xml; locale/ta.xml; locale/tl.xml

screen.phrase: fix bug #192 incorrect langcodes for locale files
Fix http://cdn... to https://cdn...
fix issue #39 change word from hardcoded to gentext

para.literal: Robert Stayton: .gitignore; Makefile; README; dsssl/dsssl.dsl; dtd/l10n.dtd; locale/Auditl⋯

screen.phrase: fix issue #62 Make use of alternate text set for mediaobject

section.title: Common
section.para: The following changes have been made to the common code since the 1.79.1 release.

screen.phrase: Update gentext.template and gentext.template.exists to fix a bug that caused gentext.template.exists to return an incorrect negative value if the template had a null string for the returned value.

para.literal: Norman Walsh: xsl/autoidx-kimber.xsl; xsl/autoidx-kosek.xsl; xsl/charmap.xsl; xsl/common.x⋯

screen.phrase: Fix http://cdn... to https://cdn...
fix issue #109 manpages extra white space namespace mismatch

para.literal: Robert Stayton: xsl/.gitignore; xsl/Makefile; xsl/addns.xsl; xsl/autoidx-kimber.xsl; xsl/a⋯

screen.phrase: fix issue #62 Make use of alternate text set for mediaobject

section.title: FO
section.para: The following changes have been made to the fo code since the 1.79.1 release.

para.literal: Robert Stayton: xsl/axf.xsl; xsl/docbook.xsl; xsl/fop1.xsl; xsl/xep.xsl

screen.phrase: keyword metadata now removes duplicates and is sorted
fix bug #189 to resolve ambiguous matches in mode xref-to
Corrected attribute set for 'xslthl:annotation'.
Use attribute sets to style highlighted text
Add 'user-axf-document-information' named template
Add back the 'd:' in element names
Discard empty keywords, de-dupe and sort remainder
fix bug #147 precedence does not apply to side regions

para.literal: Norman Walsh: xsl/admon.xsl; xsl/annotations.xsl; xsl/autoidx-kimber.xsl; xsl/autoidx-kose⋯

screen.phrase: Fix http://cdn... to https://cdn...
Clean up trivial param-name mismatch
<axf:document-info name="displaydoctitle" value="true"/> to show PDF title
fix bug #133 Citation linking to abbrev should ignore whitespace

para.literal: Robert Stayton: xsl/admon.xsl; xsl/glossary.xsl; xsl/lists.xsl; xsl/qandaset.xsl

screen.phrase: fix bug #108 indexterm before listitem triggers extra blank line
fix bug in issue #103 fix
fix issue #103 change header table to be more customizable
fix issue #39 change word from hardcoded to gentext
fix issue #105 floatstyle attribute not supported in informal objects
fix issue #99 multiple indexes with autolink.index.see fails with FOP

para.literal: Robert Stayton: xsl/.gitignore; xsl/Makefile; xsl/admon.xsl; xsl/annotations.xsl; xsl/auto⋯

screen.phrase: fix issue #62 Make use of alternate text set for mediaobject

section.title: HTML
section.para: The following changes have been made to the html code since the 1.79.1 release.

screen.phrase: fix bug #189 to resolve ambiguous matches in mode xref-to
Add webp as valid format in is.graphic.extension

para.literal: Norman Walsh: xsl/admon.xsl; xsl/autoidx-kimber.xsl; xsl/autoidx-kosek.xsl; xsl/autoidx-ng⋯

screen.phrase: Fix http://cdn... to https://cdn...
Reference to indexterm location specified by zone is not rendered if there is nested phrase (secondary, tertiary, ...)
fix bug #133 Citation linking to abbrev should ignore whitespace
fix issue #113 table entry bottom rowsep not created for morerows entry
fix issue #39 change word from hardcoded to gentext
fix issue #40 Add support for RDFalite attributes

para.literal: Robert Stayton: xsl/.gitignore; xsl/Makefile; xsl/admon.xsl; xsl/annotations.xsl; xsl/auto⋯

screen.phrase: fix issue #62 Make use of alternate text set for mediaobject
